name: Fire & Ice: The Daring Adventures of Cool Coyote
overview:
Fire and Ice was converted to the Archimedes by Paul Chapman.
It's a platform style adventure game spread across a number of different worlds, each with a different theme. The game features many levels, power-ups, bonuses, and hidden secrets.
You assume the role of a coyote and you can freeze your enemies by throwing ice-cubes at them. Once frozen you can smash them. Sometimes they leave part of a key behind after they're destroyed. The complete key, assembled from all the pieces, opens the door to the next world.
You will come across coyote puppies; these follow you, are invulnerable, and also shoot enemies. Collect the snow-flakes. Enough of these and you get a great snowball for freezing more enemies.
